name: WP TagSeeder –  Automatically Tag Your Blog Posts With Best Tags
author: TEKNIKFORCE

sections.description:
Save time and do better SEO with powerful automatic tagging. Tag Seeder will automatically tag your articles based on your settings and the content.

Demo and Tutorial

Take a look at some of its key features:
* Checks for minimum and maximum matches in post’s titles and content.
* Adds tags automatically to your new posts.

Important

We maintain the license of our plugins through the following link http://customerapi.teknikforce.com/api/wppluginverifyordercode. The plugin is free to use, but you’ll need to activate it. The activation will be done automatically through this link.

Please review our privacy policy to understand how we handle your data.

https://teknikforce.com/privacy

In case you have any questions, you can reach out to us at support@teknikforce.com or create a support ticket at http://teknikforce.com/support

We do provide support to users of this free plugin.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the WP TagSeeder folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin using the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. When you log in the first time, please provide your name and email id to receive the activation code.
  4. The process is complete.
sections.faq:
Can I add auto tags for new posts?

Yes
